note:
The Viking Mars Missions Education & Preservation Project (#VMMEPP) is a 501c3 nonprofit focused on preserving the history, artifacts, original documents, and data from the Viking Missions to Mars, to inspire current and future leaders and thinkers, and to instill collaboration and equity into missions of tomorrow.

We are an organization made up of hundreds of original Viking team Members, Volunteers, and Advisors from the aerospace industry.
